name: Poison
effect: Inflicts damage slowly over a long period of time.
desc: Toxins designed to whittle and slowly sap the life from enemies can inflict Poison or Deadly Poison.

name: Scarlet Rot
effect: Inflicts damage quickly over a long period of time.
desc: Pathogens designed to crumble the very being of its enemies and consume their flesh can inflict Scarlet Rot.

name: Blood Loss
effect: Take damage equale to percentage of Max HP.
desc: Techniques designed to wound and exsanguinate can inflict acute Blood Loss.

name: Frostbite
effect: Deals damage and lowers target's damage absorption by 20%.
desc: Cold and Freezing techniques can inflict Frostbite.

name: Madness
effect: Target loses FP and takes health damage.
desc: Contagious mental illness hailing from the Three Fingers and the Flame of Frenzy can inflict Madness.

name: Sleep
desc: Tranquilizing agents hailing from St. Trina and its lilies can inflict its targets with drowsiness, forcing them to Sleep.

name: Death Blight
desc: Corrupted influence extracted from the Rune of Death can inflict Death Blight.
